answerText: Arrow of God[10] Arrow of God is a work of this Nigerian author, who also wrote about Okonkwo's attempt to escape the shameful reputation of his father and prove his manliness in Things Fall Apart.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 3 | 14 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This novel opens with a battle between the villages of Umuraro and Okperi. [10] Name this novel in which the fellow villagers of Umuraro abandon their priest Ezeula after a famine and convert to Christianity.
